name: Winter Sleep
description:
For LudumDare40 :  Entry

Kongregate for Web Play :  Play

You are bear that preparing for winter sleep ,so you need to steal food. 

I admit I had fun while playing my game .Actually I dont have fun my own games ,except this one :D

M = map 
E = interactive  
F = eat food (you become bigger and slower but you can blow up so use carefully.You should stock food  not eat.)
P= pause
X = throw food if have

Bag increase your inventory limit.
